message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.CV 

This paper is likely to belong to the category of machine learning (cs.LG) as it proposes a method to improve the accuracy of stochastic gradient Markov chain Monte Carlo (SG-MCMC) methods, which are commonly used in machine learning. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of second-order Langevin equation, which is a popular method in machine learning for sampling from probability distributions. The paper may also be relevant to the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), control systems (cs.SY), and computer vision (cs.CV) as these fields often use SG-MCMC methods and related techniques.
